channel.title: art on Just be-cause
channel.description: Recent content in art on Just be-cause

item.title: DALL-E: the end of human creativity?
item.description: Usually I post about how I instruct machines to translate my ideas into scientific discovery. This time around I’d like to discuss something a bit different: How machines can help turn ideas into art. About a month ago I was given early research access to the DALL-E neural net by OpenAI. Fiddling with it for a few hours and skimming through different examples I was mind blown by it’s capabilities.
